comprehensive_overview: Varlociraptor is a software tool that provides rapid and comprehensive annotation of diploid genomes, including single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs), multi-nucleotide variants (MNVs), insertions and deletions (indels). It offers users the ability to compare annotated genomic variants across samples.
core_features:
1. Rapid annotation of diploid genomes
2. Identification and analysis of SNPs, MNVs, indels
3. Comparison of annotated genomic variants across samples
